title: My Pixel 1 just started rebooting over and over again today
content:
Hi,

My Pixel just rebooted itself and it just reboots constantly as it starts up.
I gets to the home screen and as I try to get into Setting it would freeze and reboot. It doesn't matter what I do, going into settings, just waiting for full reboot, as it boots, it would just reboot.

Anyone else have the same situation? Any advice would be appreciated.

Thanks
s
